column4: BRIEF-Microsoft announces global expansion for Hololens
column5: * Hololens now available for preorder in Australia  France  Germany  Ireland  New Zealand and United Kingdom  Source text for Eikon:  Further company coverage:

column4: Tesla to provide plans for combined company before SolarCity merger vote
column5: Tesla Motors Inc  said on Wednesday it will provide strategic and product plans for a combined company of the electric automaker and SolarCity Corp  ahead of a Nov. 17 merger vote by shareholders of both companies.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla to provide plans for combined company before SolarCity merger vote
column5: Oct 12 Tesla Motors Inc said on Wednesday it will provide strategic and product plans for a combined company of the electric automaker and SolarCity Corp  ahead of a Nov. 17 merger vote by shareholders of both companies.

column4: Tesla  SolarCity shareholders vote Nov. 17 on merger
column5: Oct 12 Tesla Motors Inc and SolarCity Corp said Wednesday in a U.S. securities filing that a vote to merge the two California-based companies will take place on Nov. 17.

column4: BRIEF-Tesla says co  Solarcity will unveil solar roof product on Oct 28
column5: * On October 28th  Tesla and Solarcity will unveil solar roof product

column4: BRIEF-Proterra names Tesla manufacturing veteran  Josh Ensign as chief operating officer
column5: * Heavy-Duty electric vehicle maker Proterra names Honeywell and Tesla manufacturing veteran  Josh Ensign as chief operating officer
